sentences.en: Artie went ballistic when Internal Affairs showed up.
sentences.cn: 当联邦调查委员会的人出现的时候,阿蒂神经错乱了.

sentences.en: August registrations have gone ballistic, accounting now for a quarter of the annual total.
sentences.cn: 8月份的注册人数突然暴涨，现在已经达到了年注册量的四分之一。

sentences.en: Ballistic tests have matched the weapons with bullets taken from the bodies of victims.
sentences.cn: 弹道测试表明，武器和受害者体内取出的子弹相吻合。

sentences.en: China regrets the abrogation of the Anti - Ballistic Missile Treaty.
sentences.cn: 中国对《 反 弹道导弹条约》失效感到遗憾.

sentences.en: For all practical purposes a ballistic missile such as Atlas is guided to its target.
sentences.cn: 根据各种实用目的,可使象“阿特拉斯”这样的弹道导弹导向其目标.

sentences.en: He went ballistic when I told him about the accident.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他这次意外事件后,他勃然大怒.

sentences.en: North Korea has threatened to test-fire an intercontinental ballistic missile .
sentences.cn: 朝鲜已威胁要试射一枚洲际弹道导弹。

sentences.en: Nuclear warheads for ballistic missiles are very difficult to design and build.
sentences.cn: 用于弹道导弹的核弹头对设计和制造来讲是非常困难的.

sentences.en: Rockets are important as thrust units for ballistic missiles.
sentences.cn: 火箭作为弹道导弹的推力装置很重要.

sentences.en: The damping derivatives can only be determined experimentally in the wind tunnel or ballistic range.
sentences.cn: 阻尼导数只能用风洞或弹道试验来确定.

sentences.en: The factory produces propellant for ballistic missiles.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂为弹道导弹生产推进剂。

sentences.en: The payload of a ballistic missile is its warhead.
sentences.cn: 一枚弹道导弹的有效载荷是它的弹头.

sentences.en: The Russians first fielded an intercontinental ballistic missile.
sentences.cn: 俄国人首先发射了洲际弹道导弹.

sentences.en: The use of'ballistic parachutes'is now quite common in general aviation.
sentences.cn: 使用弹道导弹降落伞'是目前很常见的通用航空.

sentences.en: This azimuth motion is known as the ballistic deflection error.
sentences.cn: 这种绕方位轴的运动称为冲击偏差.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 弹道飞弹，弹道导弹
洲际弹道导弹；洲际导弹
